description: Just like the old days… Born in 1993, Mountain Hardwear has always done things a little differently than the rest. Bringing it back to our original logo and giving it a modern take, this design reminds us of the wild places we've been and the wisdom we've picked up along the way. Because we're old enough to know better–but we're still young enough to do it anyway.
name: Mountain Hardwear Logo Landscape LS - Mens
